Miscellaneous Highlights: The Memphis Grizzlies (2-2, ninth in the Western Conference) will face the Milwaukee Bucks (1-3, 14th in the Eastern Conference) in a cross-conference matchup.
Memphis finished 27-55 overall with a 9-32 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
Milwaukee went 49-33 overall, 34-18 in Eastern Conference action and 18-22 on the road a season ago.
Others: Ja Morant: day to day (thigh), John Konchar: day to day (foot), Luke Kennard: out (foot), Zach Edey: day to day (calf), Vince Williams Jr.: out (leg), GG Jackson II: out (foot), Cam Spencer: out (ankle) for the Grizzlies.
Khris Middleton: day to day (ankle) for the Bucks.
